assumptions: EFT truncation at dim-8 with declared basis
Forward-limit positivity assumptions as in cited derivation
Observational interval used only as post-compile anchor
delta_proj_method: Not used (sign-positivity is inequality); observational interval is external.

delta_proj.note: N/A for sign-positivity; data interval is treated as external anchor.

sigma_data.note: Provided by experimental 95% CL interval; mapped to Gaussian only in optional analysis.
